snippet: The company, which markets apparel to teenagers, posted an eighth consecutive quarter of sales declines.
abstract: Aeropostale reappoints Julian Geiger as chief executive as it seeks to win back customers and stanch six quarters of losses; company reports revenue fell 13 percent, to $396.2 million, in second quarter.
lead_paragraph: The company, which markets apparel to teenagers, posted an eighth consecutive quarter of sales declines.
